string-array.name: prefAccelerometerShakeEntries
string-array.item: Hide Web View\n(requires \'Throttle Web View\' preference)

string-array.name: prefConsistFollowRuleStyleEntries
string-array.item: Complex text matching - Lead loco always activated, Trail follows preference rules below
Special Exact - Activated if the roster function label EXACTLY MATCHES the \'Default\' Label
Special Partial - Activated if the roster function label CONTAINS the \'Default\' Label or vice-versa
Special Partial Contains Only - Activated if the roster function label CONTAINS \'Default\' Label
